pr_title: Feature: Saga provide a switch to skip branch report on branch success, in order to optimize performance.

timeline.message: Skip branch report on branch commit success. #2150

timeline.bodyText:
seata/script/client/spring/application.yml
    
    
         Line 9
      in
      a1a51e0
    
    
    
    

        
          
           rm-report-success-enable: true 
        
    
  

   There is a similar function switch in AT mode. If this configuration can be combined?
timeline.author: slievrly

timeline.message: use config key[rm-report-success-enable] to skip branch report on success. #2150

timeline.bodyText: need to reset this file, CLIENT_RM_PREFIX = CLIENT_PREFIX + "rm."  The configuration name here is a dash, not a dot.
timeline.author: slievrly
